entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
